text: Raashid Alvi is an Indian politician who served as a member of the Indian Parliament from both the Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha. He is currently a member of the Indian National Congress party. == Early life == Raashid Alvi was born in Chandpur, Bijnor, Uttar Pradesh, on 15 April 1956, to Islama Khatoon and Malik Irfan Ahmad Alvi, a freedom fighter == References == == Other websites == * * Raashid Alvi's Profile on Jan Pratinidhi Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh
title: Raashid Alvi
